document.full_text: the london 2012 olympics has unwittingly acquired its first iconic image after unveiling an olympic torch design which looks like a huge cheesegrater on wednesday.
document.title: london 2012 unveils "golden cheesegrater" olympic torch
lines_and_colors: the london 2012 olympics has unwittingly acquired its first iconic image after unveiling an olympic torch design which looks like a huge cheesegrater on wednesday.
